title: TravelPilot
description: Plan, manage, and organize your trips effortlessly. Built with React JS and Tailwind CSS, TravelPilot offers a clean and responsive interface to streamline your travel planning experience.

title: MERN-Auth App
description: This web app, built with the MERN stack, features authentication (signup, login, logout, update) and access to protected routes. Firebase is used for storage and authentication.

title: ToDo-List-React
description: This project was built using React and Redux, and allows users to create and manage their to-do lists.

title: LoginApp-MERN
description: This is a full-stack login application built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js). The app allows users to register an account and securely log in with their email and password.

title: E-commerce-MERN
description: A fully functional e-commerce website using the MERN stack. This project includes essential features such as user authentication, product listings, shopping cart, and checkout functionality.

title: BMI-Calculator-React
description: This application was built using React, and allows users to calculate their body mass index (BMI) based on their weight and height.

title: Reddit-Display
description: This application fetches JSON data from the Reddit API for the "React.Js" subreddit and displays the data in a user-friendly format. The app is built using React and Material-UI to ensure a clean and responsive user interface.

title: Single-HTML-Page
description: This website showcases my skills in HTML and CSS, and features a simple and clean design. In addition to the visual design, I've also focused on creating clean and semantic HTML code.
